newsitem.title: UK: Cazenove Indian GDR Index up 0.70 percent.
newsitem.headline: Cazenove Indian GDR Index up 0.70 percent.

text.p: The Cazenove Indian GDR Index rose 0.65 points, 0.70 percent, to 78.78 points after the Bombay Stock Exchange 30 share index fell 16.70 points, or 0.49 percent to a provisional 3,389.52.
The premium for GDRs over stocks on the local market was 11.51 percent after yesterday's 10.51 percent.
The Cazenove index is a capitalisation weighted basket of Indian global depositary receipts and measures the change from midday on the previous trading day to midday today.
